content: in each of next 2 sts single_crochet in turning chain of step 19 do not turn 22 ch6 rotate piece 90o clockwise skip chain next to hook slip_stitch into next chain slstdec across next 2 chs do not turn 23 ch2 rotate piece 90o clockwise skip chain next to hook slip_stitch into next chain single_crochet in slstdec of step 22 do not turn 24 double_crochet in each of next 2 sts flip piece double_crochet in each of next 2 sts do not turn 25 ch1 rotate piece 900 clockwise slip_stitch into side of last double_crochet of step 24 slip_stitch into base of that same double_crochet rotate piece 900 counter-clockwise skip next st of step 21 slip_stitch into next st the slip_stitch at beginning of step 21 do not turn note dotted lines in diagram indicate the direct connection between the recipient sts of previous steps and the working sts of step26 as indicated in the following text 26 single_crochet in next st the slip_stitch at the end of step 20 single_crochet in each of next 5 unworked sts of step 19 single_crochet in turning chain of step 18 do not turn butt/tail 27 ch12 rotate piece 90o clockwise skip chain next to hook slip_stitch into next chain single_crochet into each of next 6 chs 2sc in next chain single_crochet in each of next 3 chs flip piece single_crochet in each of next 6 sts slip_stitch into next st ch1 turn 28 skip 1st st the last slip_stitch of step 27 slip_stitch into next st 2sc in next st half_double_crochet in next st double_crochet in each of next 4 sts half_double_crochet in each of next 3 sts single_crochet in each of next 6 sts slip_stitch into next st do not turn tail barb 29 ch3 rotate piece 90o clockwise skip chain next to hook slip_stitch into next chain skip next chain rotate piece 900 counter-clockwise single_crochet in slip_stitch in second to last chain of ch12 of step 27 double_crochet in 12th chain of step 27 the tip of the tail ch1 rotate piece 900 clockwise slip_stitch into side of the double_crochet just made do not turn 30 ch3 rotate piece 900 clockwise skip chain next to hook slip_stitch into next chain single_crochet in next chain rotate piece 900 clockwise working back along top of tail in the free loops of chain 12 from step 27 slip_stitch into 12th chain of step 27 slip_stitch into free loop of next chain 11th chain of chain 12 in step 27 do not turn abbreviations yarn over yo chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet half-double_crochet half_double_crochet double crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet stitch st stitches sts skip skip decrease decrease spines 31 ch3 rotate 900 clockwise skip chain next to hook slip_stitch into next chain half_double_crochet in next chain rotate piece 900 counter-clockwise continue working in free loops of chain 12 from step 27 skip 2 chs slip_stitch into free loops of each of next 2 chs do not turn 32 ch4 rotate piece
